name: The last flame (shevekk, FougereBle)
description:
The last magical flame is in your hands, you must protect it from wind and monsters to save your city from extinction.

Colliding with NPCs to bring them into your army, once your army is formed you can create formations to face the wind and the enemies.

The world is traversed by great wind currents that may extinguish your flame, to prevent this put at least three troops with shields in the direction of the wind.

Send your soldiers with swords on the front line to face the monsters and prevent them from killing your protectors and extinguishing the flame.

Sounds and Musics : opengameart.org & lasonotheque.org
Software : Unity, Aseprite, Pyxel Edit, SFXR
